lyrics.text: Lesson 49 The End of a Dream
lyrics.translation: 第49课 一个梦的结束

lyrics.text: First listen and then answer the question.
lyrics.translation: 首先听录音，然后回答问题。

lyrics.text: When he was tired of sleeping on the floor, a young man in Tehran saved up for years to buy a real bed.
lyrics.translation: 当德黑兰的一个年轻人厌倦了睡地板时，他攒了好几年的钱买了一张真正的床。

lyrics.text: For the first time in his life, he became the proud owner of a bed which had springs and a mattress.
lyrics.translation: 在他的一生中，他第一次成为了一个拥有弹簧和床垫的床的自豪主人。

lyrics.text: Because the weather was very hot, he carried the bed onto the roof of his house.
lyrics.translation: 因为天气非常炎热，他把床搬到了房顶上。

lyrics.text: He slept very well for the first two nights, but on the third night a storm blew up.
lyrics.translation: 他在前两个晚上睡得非常好，但在第三个晚上，暴风雨来了。

lyrics.text: A gust of wind swept the bed off the roof and sent it crashing into the courtyard below.
lyrics.translation: 一阵风吹落了屋顶上的床，将其摔到了下面的院子里。

lyrics.text: The young man did not wake up until the bed had struck the ground.
lyrics.translation: 年轻人直到床碰到地面才醒来。

lyrics.text: Although the bed was smashed to pieces, the man was miraculously unhurt.
lyrics.translation: 尽管床被砸得粉碎，但那人却奇迹般地没有受伤。

lyrics.text: When he woke up, he was still on the mattress.
lyrics.translation: 当他醒来时，他仍然躺在床垫上。

lyrics.text: Glancing at the bits of wood and metal that lay around him, the man sadly picked up the mattress and carried it into his house.
lyrics.translation: 他瞥了一眼散落在他周围的木片和金属碎片，悲伤地捡起床垫，把它搬进了自己的房子。

lyrics.text: After he had put it on the floor, he promptly went to sleep again.
lyrics.translation: 他把它放在地上后，立刻又去睡觉了。
